attributes.action: Put a cap on consultant fees at £1000 per day.
attributes.additional_details: NHS nurses have been given a measly 1% pay rise despite being on the frontline of the worst health crisis in a generation.  Consultants for this new agency are getting filthy rich and despite the marketing bluster have not been able to make a compelling case for their fees.  A staggering amount of money is being wasted on consultants and key to getting this under control is capping their fees.
attributes.background: Now that it has come to light that NHS Test and Trace has spent staggering sums of money on consultants, with some being paid £6,600 per day, it is time to say enough is enough!

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition we currently have open on this topic:

Limit public sector spending on external consultants
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554565
